languages.text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.

traits.locale_text: At the start of each turn, the wielder receives deflection and temporary wounds equal to the number of bleeding enemies.

At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 fresh injury is removed from the wearer as well.

At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.

At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.

languages.text: 着用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}しているクリーチャーの数に等しい数の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を回復する。そのようにして少なくとも1つの傷が回復した場合、着用者からも{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新たな傷{/g}が1つ取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.

traits.locale_text: 着用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}している敵の数に等しい数の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復する。そのようにして少なくとも1つの傷が回復した場合、着用者からも新たな傷が1つ取り除かれる。

languages.text: 装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态生物的数量。如果此效果至少为装备者恢复了1点生命值，则还会为装备者移除一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.

traits.locale_text: 装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态敌人的数量。如果此效果至少为装备者恢复了1点生命值，则还会为装备者移除一处新伤。

languages.text: Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador recupera un número de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} igual al número de criaturas con {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}. Si recupera al menos 1 herida de este modo, el portador también se recupera de 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión reciente{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.

traits.locale_text: Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador recupera un número de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} igual al número de enemigos con {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}. Si recupera al menos 1 herida de este modo, el portador también se recupera de 1 lesión reciente.

languages.text: Zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} erhält der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zurück, und zwar entsprechend der Anzahl {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutender{/g} Kreaturen. Wenn auf diese Weise mindestens 1 Wunde zurückerlangt wurde, wird außerdem 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}frische Verletzung{/g} vom Träger entfernt.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} erhält der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zurück, und zwar entsprechend der Anzahl {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutender{/g} Feinde. Wenn auf diese Weise mindestens 1 Wunde zurückerlangt wurde, wird außerdem 1 frische Verletzung vom Träger entfernt.

languages.text: Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur récupère un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} égal au nombre de créatures frappées par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}. Si au moins 1 blessure a ainsi été récupérée, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion récente{/g} est également retirée à l'utilisateur.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.

traits.locale_text: Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur récupère un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} égal au nombre d'ennemis frappés par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}. Si au moins 1 blessure a ainsi été récupérée, 1 lésion récente est également retirée à l'utilisateur.

languages.text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} в объеме, равном числу противников с {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечением{/g}. Если восстановлена хотя бы 1 единица здоровья, с персонажа также снимается 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}свежее ранение{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 fresh injury is removed from the wearer as well.

traits.locale_text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} в объеме, равном числу противников с {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечением{/g}. Если восстановлена хотя бы 1 единица здоровья, с персонажа также снимается 1 свежее ранение.

В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} в объеме, равном числу противников с {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечением{/g}. Если восстановлена хотя бы 1 единица здоровья, с персонажа также снимается 1 свежее ранение.
